Title: Dawg Coffee
Description: A website for a fictitious coffee shop that displays my HTML, CSS, and mobile friendly design skills.

Title: Police Shootings
Description: An interactive map built using Leaflet.js to show crowd-sourced data about police shootings.

Title: Ratings and Reviews
Description: Uses the Parse database to store review data and user interactions.

Title: Spotify Quiz
Description: An angular application that accesses the Spotify API to quiz you on playlists.

Title: Reliv
Description: My final project for INFO 343. It is a website that allows users to buy and sell products, whose proceeds go to designated charities.

Title: Fifteen Puzzle
Description: A puzzle that you have to solve by moving tiles 1 by 1 until the picture is correct

Title: To-do List
Description: A website that stores users and lets you keep a list of items
